name: One More Floor (John Spantouris, katsos, Evgenia Gavala, Angelo Tsiflas, Ayanthus)
name_original: One More Floor (John Spantouris, katsos, Evgenia Gavala, Angelo Tsiflas, Ayanthus)
description:
Many have tried to ascend the Holy Tuna Temple but none has survived to tell the tale. Will you be the one to succeed? 

One More Floor is an endless action roguelike game created for the 2020 Epic Megajam. You play as a badass axe-wielding cat, on her way up the endless, infamous Holy Tuna Temple. The temple is filled with unknown dangers, is protected by fish and shark-dog monsters and is rumored to have the Can of Infinite Tuna on the top of it. Our protagonist has already gotten up quite a bit far up the temple but she needs your help ascending through the rest of the temple.

Controls with keyboard:

  • Movement - W/A/S/D
  • Climb wall - Spacebar
  • Light Attack - Left click
  • Heavy Attack - Right click
